COPY.ONCLICK: new $K.yg_wndobj({literal}{{/literal} config: 'PAGE_COPY', loadparams: {literal}{{/literal} action: 'copy', opener_reference: this.wndobj.id, site: $(this.wndobj.id+'_dd_site').value{literal} } }{/literal});

MOVETO.ONCLICK: new $K.yg_wndobj({literal}{{/literal} config: 'PAGE_MOVE', loadparams: {literal}{{/literal} action: 'move', opener_reference: this.wndobj.id, site: $(this.wndobj.id+'_dd_site').value{literal} } }{/literal});

EDIT.ONCLICK: $K.yg_preview({literal}{{/literal}objecttype: 'file', id: this.wndobj.loadparams['objectid'], version: $('wid_'+this.wndobj.num+'_ddversion').down().next('input').value, view: $('wid_'+this.wndobj.num+'_ddview').down().next('input').value.split('#!#!#')[0], zoom:$('wid_'+this.wndobj.num+'_ddzoom').down().next('input').value, fullscreen: true, crop: true{literal}}{/literal});$K.windows[this.wndobj.id].remove();

COPY.ONCLICK: new $K.yg_wndobj({literal}{{/literal} config: 'FOLDER_COPY', loadparams: {literal}{{/literal} opener_reference: this.wndobj.id, type: 'folder' {literal}} }{/literal});

MOVETO.ONCLICK: new $K.yg_wndobj({literal}{{/literal} config: 'FOLDER_MOVE', loadparams: {literal}{{/literal} opener_reference: this.wndobj.id, type: 'folder' {literal}} }{/literal});
